subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: It has been 25 years since Yannick Noah, now a pop star, won the French Open, leaping into the arms of his father and embedding himself in the memory banks of a generation or two.
snippet: It has been 25 years since Yannick Noah, now a pop star, won the French Open, leaping into the arms of his father and embedding himself in the memory banks of a generation or two.
